wordGroup: happiness consists in contentment 知足常乐；幸福在于满足

sentences.en: They found contentment in living a simple life.
sentences.cn: 他们在简朴的生活中得到满足。

sentences.en: He felt a sudden sense of calm, of contentment.
sentences.cn: 他突然感受到了内心的平静和满足。

sentences.en: I cannot describe the feeling of contentment that was with me at that time.
sentences.cn: 我无法形容我当时的满足感。
